title: Applied Optics Blended Learning Course: Constructivist Project-Based Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Physics and Optical Theory
context.additional_context: Process for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to acquire applied optical technologies through real-world R&D project simulations, utilizing a blended learning environment with personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Design and execute collaborative projects to solve real-world optical problems in industrial settings.
Demonstrate the ability to quantitatively analyze and interpret optical experiment data.
Establishing and executing self-directed learning plans using a blended learning platform

resources: Optical Experiment Kit (Lenses, Lasers, Spectrometers, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
